description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in common.inc.php in PgMarket 2.2.3, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the CFG[libdir] parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4116

description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in IBM WebSphere Application Server before 6.0.2.13 have unspecified vectors and impact, including (1) an "authority problem" in ThreadIdentitySupport as identified by PK25199, and "Potential security exposure" issues as identified by (2) PK22747, (3) PK24334, (4) PK25740, and (5) PK26123.
